title: Welcome, Coach Thiago Motta! - Juventus
snippet: Welcome, Coach Thiago Motta! Juventus Football Club is delighted to announce Thiago Motta as the new First Team head coach.

title: Welcome, Coach Luciano Spalletti - Juventus
snippet: Luciano Spalletti is the new head coach of Juventus, signing an agreement with the Club until June 30, 2026. Born in Certaldo, in the province of...

title: Juventus FC - Wikipedia
snippet: On 8 August 2020, Sarri was sacked from his managerial position, one day after Juventus were eliminated from the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League by Lyon. On the same day, former player Andrea Pirlo was announced as the new coach, signing a two-year contract.

title: Juventus FC - Current and former staff | Transfermarkt
snippet: Juventus FC UEFA U19 · Juventus Youth · The record of current and former staff lists all coaches, presidents, athletic directors, etc. who have ever worked for the selected club, along. Under "Position", you can select a specific role from the drop-down menu.

title: Igor Tudor is no longer Juventus' head coach - Juventus
snippet: Juventus Football Club announces that it has today relieved Igor Tudor of his duties as head coach of the Men's First Team, along with his staff consisting of Ivan Javorcic, Tomislav Rogic and Riccardo Ragnacci.
